column5: No room in the garage here for this toy (or budget) but if you're going off road, you might as well go all the way.  http://truckyeah.jalopnik.com/the-russians-make-the-best-truck-in-the-universe-for-5-1758030433
Seen this on FB last week....I want 1

If I take a Russian farm tractor and build a box on the back is it still a tractor or is it a 45 HP Ruskie SUV?  Does anyone realize the amount of Armour All it would take to shine those tires? I do NOT want one. Parts can't be had at Princess Auto or CTC. My pal that bought a farm close by got a great deal on a Serbian or Romanian or some Iron Curtain country built tractor. When we went to the local JD dealer for a water pump they could still be heard laughing while we drove away. I pass.
You could pay almost that much for an Argo, that thing could crush an Argo.
fun toy had I won the powerball lotto
Exactly!  Imagine early ice jiggin out the front window???
Exactly!  Imagine early ice jiggin out the front window You bet!!!
$1000 each Ontario recycle charge on the tires.
